analysisPopulations.name: Screened Set
analysisPopulations.label: Screened
analysisPopulations.description: All participants who signed an informed consent form (ICF).

analysisPopulations.name: Enrolled Set
analysisPopulations.label: Enrolled
analysisPopulations.description: All participants who were enrolled in the study.

analysisPopulations.name: Full Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.label: FA
analysisPopulations.description: All enrolled participants who received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840. The FA Set will be the primary population for all efficacy analyses.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Enrolled and received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840

analysisPopulations.name: Per Protocol Set
analysisPopulations.label: PP
analysisPopulations.description: A subset of the FA Set who have no major protocol deviations that would affect the primary efficacy endpoint. The PP Set will be used for sensitivity analyses of the primary efficacy endpoint.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Subset of FA Set with no major protocol deviations affecting the primary efficacy endpoint

analysisPopulations.name: Safety Set
analysisPopulations.label: Safety
analysisPopulations.description: All enrolled participants who received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840. The Safety Set will be used for all safety analyses.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Enrolled and received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840

analysisPopulations.name: Pharmacokinetic Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.label: PK
analysisPopulations.description: All participants in the Safety Set who have sufficient plasma concentration data to derive at least 1 PK parameter. The PK Analysis Set will be used for all PK analyses.
analysisPopulations.criteria: In Safety Set and has sufficient plasma concentration data for at least 1 PK parameter

analysisPopulations.name: Pharmacodynamic Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.label: PD
analysisPopulations.description: All participants in the Safety Set who have sufficient PD data to derive at least 1 PD parameter. The PD Analysis Set will be used for all PD analyses.
analysisPopulations.criteria: In Safety Set and has sufficient PD data for at least 1 PD parameter

characteristics.name: Age
characteristics.description: Demographic variable for age to be summarized.

characteristics.name: Sex
characteristics.description: Demographic variable for sex to be summarized.

characteristics.name: Race
characteristics.description: Demographic variable for race to be summarized.

characteristics.name: Ethnicity
characteristics.description: Demographic variable for ethnicity to be summarized.

characteristics.name: Wilson Disease (WD) history
characteristics.description: Includes age at diagnosis, initial WD presentation (hepatic, neurologic, psychiatric, other), and family history of WD.

characteristics.name: Baseline body mass index (BMI)
characteristics.description: Baseline disease characteristic for body mass index.

characteristics.name: Baseline vital signs
characteristics.description: Includes systolic and diastolic blood pressure, heart rate, respiratory rate, and temperature.

characteristics.name: Baseline laboratory parameters
characteristics.description: Baseline disease characteristic for laboratory parameters.

characteristics.name: Baseline electrocardiogram (ECG) parameters
characteristics.description: Baseline disease characteristic for ECG parameters.

characteristics.name: Medical/Surgical History
characteristics.description: Medical and surgical history coded using MedDRA and summarized by system organ class (SOC) and preferred term (PT).

characteristics.name: Prior medications used to treat WD
characteristics.description: Prior medications used to treat Wilson Disease will be summarized separately.
